contributionDescription: Waiting to trade on Optimism every week, I am confident in the future development of Optimism. I hope it will get better and better, become the main force of the blockchain on L2, and bring hope to the world.Supporting Optimism is the greatest contribution to the blockchain. We will never look back, come on!
impactDescription: I still have a lot to do. I strive to trade once every two or three days, try to use optimization to complete all my work, understand optimization clearly, study hard for the future development of the blockchain, constantly summarize and communicate in practice, and work hard to promote the benefits of optimization.
pwFlaggedReason: The application should be flagged for violating the rules on promises of future impact and outside of RetroPGF's scope as the applicant is substantially detailing future plans and predicted impacts, and doesn't provide a clear description or evidence of a valid past contribution to Optimism as required.
